title: 1 bedroom condo for rent in Brewerytown
description:
Stylish and Modern 1 Bedroom/1 Bathroom Condo in Brewerytown - This beautiful 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo in the heart of Brewerytown is the perfect home for anyone seeking the ultimate urban living experience. With its spacious and open floor plan, this unit is ideal for entertaining guests or simply relaxing after a long day at work.
Location:
This charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo is located in the heart of Brewerytown, one of Philadelphia's most popular up-and-coming neighborhoods. There are several restaurants, bars, and shops within walking distance on Girard and Fairmount Ave, as well as the SEPTA Broad Street Line station. The unit is also close to the University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, and Temple University.
Amenities:
This beautiful unit features high ceilings, hardwood floors, a Juliette balcony, and a rooftop deck with stunning views of the city. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, and plenty of storage space. The large and bright bedroom has plenty of closet space and full-length mirrors. The unit also includes a washer and dryer in unit, as well as all of the following furniture:
-Queen-size bed
-Dresser
-Sofa
-Coffee table
-Dining table
-Chairs
-Flat-screen TV
-Roku
-Extra storage and shelving

title: $2,200 / 1br - WANAMAKER HOUSE 1 bdrm NEWLY RENOVATED
description:
AVAILABLE 7/1/23: Fully renovated one bedroom, one bathroom on a high floor of The Wanamaker House. This sun-drenched apartment features bay windows in all rooms and magnificent city views to the west. Enter the residence into a foyer with double coat closet. The generously sized living and dining room with recessed LED lighting has incredible natural light thanks to a bay window looking over the city. Open to the living room, there is a kitchen with all new cabinetry, granite counter tops, and stainless steel appliances. The spacious bedroom has excellent closet space, including a walk-in closet, and enjoys use of a full ceramic tiled bathroom with walk-in shower and granite topped vanity.
Having just undergone a BUILDING-WIDE renovation, residents of The Wanamaker House enjoy a doorman, 24-hour front desk, access to the roof top swimming pool, exercise room, sauna and on-site garage parking for a fee. Located steps from Rittenhouse Square, ranked the 6th best neighborhood in North America by Place Rated Almanac, there are 175 restaurants and 199 retailers within a three block radius of Wanamaker House. It is within close walking distance to the Market Street office corridor, The Avenue of the Arts and University City. Amtrak's 30th Street Station and Philadelphia International Airport are only minutes away. Contact:  show contact info

Available Early May:
This magnificent 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom townhome is a split level / trinity style rental offering garage off-street parking, rooftop deck, oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, central air, and so much more!
Enter into the 1st level through the courtyard. The back garage enters halfway up with a little entry area and then up another half level is the beautiful modern kitchen and dining area with slate tile flooring and a full wall of windows for sunlight. The kitchen overlooks Columbus Boulevard and the river, and boasts an island with counter seating, white shaker cabinets, lovely tile backsplash, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and wine fridge. The kitchen cabinets extend into the dining area for extra storage and a powder room ensures that entertaining guests is a breeze! Up another half level brings you into the spacious living room with a built-in speaker system featuring giant windows, a ceiling fan, fireplace, and a built-in desk with storage. Continue up another level to view 2 sizable bedrooms with good closet space, a full bathroom, and your in-unit washer and dryer. Head to the top floor to view your primary bedroom with a courtyard view, ceiling fan for added comfort, walk-in closet with built-ins, and tons of space for a king sized bed plus additional furniture. An attached bathroom provides added luxury and is equipped with gorgeous tiling, dual sink vanities, and a stunning glass shower stall. Your roof deck awaits upstairs with breathtaking Walt Whitman Bridge views.
There's 1 garage off-street parking spot making this the ideal home for you!

description:

Looking for a place to call home for a month or longer? We have everything you need without the hassles of traditional apartments, all at a great rate. Each room comes with a fully equipped kitchen and plenty of workspace. And unlike apartments, cable and Wi-Fi are already hooked up and free! With no leases and no credit checks, we are move-in ready. Actual room may vary from those shown.Pet Policy: A $25 (+ tax) per day, per pet non-refundable cleaning fee for the first month (not to exceed $150 + tax per pet), payable the first night of your stay. Each month thereafter is a $10 non-refundable fee (+tax) per day for the first 5 days of each month (not to exceed $50 + tax per month, per pet). Weight, size, and breed restrictions may apply.This site may contain errors, inaccuracies, omissions or incomplete data (including without limitation mistaken hotel rates or availability). Extended Stay America reserves the right to rescind any stated offer and to correct any errors, inaccuracies or omissions including after a reservation order has been submitted and whether or not the order has been confirmed and your credit card charged.Extended Stay America - 877 N. title: newly renovated, spacious twin
description: The newly renovated, spacious 3 bd/2.5 ba, 1,781sqft twin available for immediate rent in Warminster, PA 18974. $2,400 per month plus utilities. Freshly painted with brand new laminate on 1st floor and carpeting on 2nd floor. Open and airy floorplan that seamlessly blends the living, dining, family rooms and kitchen. A cathedral ceiling in the entrance/living room. The eat in kitchen has been nicely updated with Corian counters, lots of cabinets, and brand new stainless steel appliances. The family room features a wood-burning fireplace. Laundry (with washer, dryer and sink)/utility room, a pantry and access to the garage complete the first floor.  Upstairs, are 3 spacious bedrooms. All with large closets for plenty of storage.  2.5 bathrooms. Garage, driveway and street parking. Attic with plenty of storage space. Fenced spacious backyard. New Central HVAC and heating. Located within walking distance to excellent schools (Centennial School District), just a few minutes drive to great shopping and restaurants. First and last month rent plus security deposit. Credit check.  Minimum 1 year lease.

title: ed, 1 bath corner condo with modern finishes and expansive floor-to-ce
description:
1
bed
1
bath
803sqft
803 square feet
200 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19106
1 bed, 1 bath corner condo with modern finishes and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows that display mesmerizing skyline and river views. This sought-after, fully amenitized building offers a welcome desk and security staffed 24/7, a fitness center, a brand new saltwater pool, garage parking, and barbecues. In addition, the meticulously manicured grounds have on-site laundry, cleaners, a market, and top-rated restaurants steps away. Stepping into the unit, you're welcomed by a foyer with a coat closet and wide plank hardwood floors that continue throughout. The main living space is open, bright, and airy, with the towering wall of windows providing a feeling of floating in the sky. The stunning gourmet kitchen is fitted with quartz countertops, shaker-style cabinets, stainless steel appliances, a marble backsplash, recessed lighting, and a contrasting island with seating. The living and dining areas have plenty of space to create a layout that combines form and function. Completing the unit is the large bedroom with more picturesque windows and a luxurious bathroom adorned with a quartz vanity and marble tile shower. In addition to everything inside, this fantastic location earns a Walk Score of 98! James Beard Awarded Zahav restaurant is sat on the grounds, while Positano Coast and Landmark's Ritz Five theater are across the street. title: Modern Luxe Condo In Premeir Boutique Building With Amazing Old City Views!
description:
Reply to this listing for more information.
- This property not quite what you’re looking for ? Still reply to this listing! I am a licensed real estate agent in the Philadelphia area and I am here to help YOU!
Property Details:
- 122 30 New Street
- 2 Br
- 2.5 Ba
- 1,544 Sqr ft
- $3,950/mo
______________________________________
Welcome to luxury City living at it's very best! This premier boutique building offers residents a host of modern amenities in a secure, serene setting. As you enter the pristine lobby with its intimate, landscaped courtyard, you'll know you've discovered a hidden gem.
Open the front door and you'll be met with a flood of natural light and spectacular, sweeping city views from the floor to ceiling walls of windows. The main living space is dramatic, yet comfortable featuring an enormous gourmet kitchen, spacious living/dining area, gas fireplace, custom built-in's and so much more. An entertainers dream where every detail has been carefully thought out. The kitchen is a masterpiece of modern design with loads of custom cabinetry, high-end stainless steel appliances, oversized island with seating and pendant lighting, abundant quartz countertops. pantry storage, bar area and the list goes on. Best of all are the jaw dropping views of the bustling city which immerse you in its energy while you relax in your own private oasis. Head down the hall and you'll find the first bedroom which can also be used as a versatile office space, den/family room or any combination thereof to suit your needs. The massive, custom glass barn door allows for natural light, privacy and seamless flow with the rest of the living spaces. This bedroom also features a large en suite bath. Further down the hall is the elegant powder room, perfect for guests as well as a separate laundry room with plenty of storage and in-unit washer/dryer. At the end of the hall, you'll find the luxurious owner's suite with large bedroom, enormous walk-in closet with natural light and spacious dressing area and newly updated en-suite bath with large soaking tub, stall shower and double vanity.
This upscale residence also includes one assigned parking space in the secure parking garage as well as use of the gated, park-like garden perfect for outdoor meditation or an urban picnic. Looking for a luxury city residence that truly has it all?
______________________________________
